info.title: IRCTC Indian Railway PNR STATUS
info.description: Get Real-Time Indian Railway PNR Status Updates. Stay informed with accurate and timely PNR status information directly from the Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) database. Provides real-time updates on passenger reservations.

get.description: Retrieve the current status of a passenger's reservation using their PNR number. Fetches real-time PNR status directly from the IRCTC database.

parameters.name: pnrNumber
parameters.description: PNR (Passenger Name Record) number for the railway reservation
